WorkItem.Description:
so, i've run into some problems along the way some i dont know how to fix. 
my first problem was an error that said somthing about access denied, you fix that by taking the extracted files out of your temporary folder becuase that folder has special security locks in it. my second problem is a simple app crash, i have no idea whats causing the problem the details are
 
i open the program and i see my webcam, then about a second later it crashes and gives me these details, 
 
AppName: touchlessdemo.exe      AppVer: 1.0.0.0     AppStamp:48e95946
ModName: gdiplus.dll      ModVer: 5.1.3102.5512      ModStamp:4802a091
fDebug: 0       Offset: 00057079
 
so any help would be great
! thanks

Comments.Message: sounds like the WebCamLib used in this project doesn't like your webcam. Sorry but I can't provide further assistance with that... others?
